pullRequest.title: fix(TBD-9455): tDynamoDbInput, tDynamoDbOutput: ClassNotFoundException: com.amazonaws.auth.AWSCredentials
pullRequest.bodyText:
…n: com.amazonaws.auth.AWSCredentials
Please check if the PR fulfills these requirements

 The commit(s) message(s) follows our guidelines ?
 Unit tests for the Java changes have been added (for bug fixes / features) ?
 TUJ for the JavaJet changes have been added (for bug fixes / features) ?
 Docs have been added / updated (for bug fixes / features) ?
 The new code does not introduce new technical issues

What is the current behavior? (You can also link to an open issue here)
What is the new behavior?
BREAKING CHANGE
If this PR contains a breaking change, please describe the impact and migration
path for existing applications.
If not please remove this section.
Other information:

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -225,20 +225,27 @@
 	</ADVANCED_PARAMETERS>
 	<CODEGENERATION>
      <IMPORTS>
-         <IMPORT NAME="log4j-1.2.17" MODULE="log4j-1.2.17.jar"
-                 MVN="mvn:log4j/log4j/1.2.17"/>
-         <IMPORT NAME="commons-lang-2.6.jar" MODULE="commons-lang-2.6.jar"
-                 MVN="mvn:commons-lang/commons-lang/2.6"
-                 REQUIRED="true"/>
-         <IMPORT NAME="aws-java-sdk-1.11.406.jar" MODULE="aws-java-sdk-1.11.406.jar"
-                 MVN="mvn:com.amazonaws/aws-java-sdk/1.11.406"
-                 REQUIRED="true"/>
-         <IMPORT NAME="jackson-core-2.10.1.jar" MODULE="jackson-core-2.10.1.jar"
-                 MVN="mvn:com.fasterxml.jackson.core/jackson-core/2.10.1"
-                 REQUIRED="true"/>
-         <IMPORT NAME="jackson-databind-2.10.1.jar" MODULE="jackson-databind-2.10.1.jar"
-			MVN="mvn:com.fasterxml.jackson.core/jackson-databind/2.10.1"
+	 	
+     <IMPORT NAME="commons-lang-2.6.jar" MODULE="commons-lang-2.6.jar"
+			MVN="mvn:commons-lang/commons-lang/2.6"
 			REQUIRED="true" />
+		<IMPORT NAME="aws-java-sdk-core-1.11.160.jar" MODULE="aws-java-sdk-core-1.11.160.jar"
+			MVN="mvn:com.amazonaws/aws-java-sdk-core/1.11.160"
+			REQUIRED="true" />
+		<IMPORT NAME="aws-java-sdk-dynamodb-1.11.160.jar" MODULE="aws-java-sdk-dynamodb-1.11.160.jar"
+			MVN="mvn:com.amazonaws/aws-java-sdk-dynamodb/1.11.160"
+			REQUIRED="true" />
+		<IMPORT NAME="jackson-core-2.10.1.jar" MODULE="jackson-core-2.10.1.jar"
+			MVN="mvn:com.fasterxml.jackson.core/jackson-core/2.10.1"
+			REQUIRED="true" />
+		<IMPORT NAME="jackson-databind-2.10.1.jar" MODULE="jackson-databind-2.10.1.jar"
+      MVN="mvn:com.fasterxml.jackson.core/jackson-databind/2.10.1"
+			REQUIRED="true" />
+     <IMPORT NAME="log4j-1.2.17" MODULE="log4j-1.2.17.jar"
+        MVN="mvn:log4j/log4j/1.2.17"/>

nodes.bodyText: There are a lot of other 3rd party jars are included to dependency block (e.g. for the latest version https://repo1.maven.org/maven2/com/amazonaws/aws-java-sdk/1.11.701/aws-java-sdk-1.11.701.pom), but you're adding only 2 dependencies. Could you please confirm that it shouldn't cause any ClassNotFound errors?

commit.message: fix(TBD-9455): fix whitespaces for tDynamoDb components
